login.mensaje2Error400: We will help you remember your password if you forgot it soon;)
login.mensaje3Error400: If this is not the case, check the data and try again
login.mensaje4Error400: (suspense music turututuru) you only have one life left!
login.mensaje5Error400: If you do not copy the information correctly in the username or password fields, you will go directly to the world of O_o blocking
login.mensaje2Error403: For your safety, we had to block your user for unsuccessful login attempts ...
login.mensaje3Error403: but don't worry, contact your agent and they will help you solve this problem;)
login.mensaje2Error405: It seems that you are not registered with us
login.mensaje3Error405: contact us and start using our services
login.noTienesCuenta: You do not have an account?

establecimiento.noTeCompliques: Do not complicate yourself if you have many properties registered, here you can choose the one you want to manage at this time, that is why we show you a list so you can choose the one you need.
establecimiento.seleccionaInmueble: Select here the property you want to manage
establecimiento.editarEsFacil: Editing the details of the establishment will be so easy, that you will not even realize that you finished and left everything ready :D

cierreSesion.mensajeCierre: This session will be closed in

cambiarPass.parrafo: Choose a new for password your account
cambiarPass.titulo2: ¡Ready! Your password just came out of the oven :D
cambiarPass.parrafo2: ¿How about trying it now by starting your session?
cambiarPass.titulo3: ¡Hum! This link is a bit old, I think we better send you another.
cambiarPass.parrafo3: We are very concerned about your security, that is why this link had a limited validity.
cambiarPass.parrafo4: Now you have a new opportunity to go through the process to create a new password again.
cambiarPass.titulo4: Apparently there is an error in the matrix, because we did not know this account.
cambiarPass.parrafo5: Please check if you copied the email correctly, as we cannot find this account in our database.
cambiarPass.parrafo6: It is best to go through the process to create a new password again.
cambiarPass.titulo5: 1..2..3 ... for the password that was not!
cambiarPass.parrafo7: Please check if you copied the password that was sent to your email.
cambiarPass.parrafo8: It is best to go through the process to create a new password again.

cambiarPassUsuario.parrafo: Choose a new for password your account

recuperarPass.parrafo: Enter the email with which you registered, to be able to send you the instructions on how to create your new password.
recuperarPass.parrafo2: We have sent you a message so you can reset your password.

cartelera.eventosParaNoSalir: Find out in seconds about the most important topics
cartelera.eventosImportantes: These will be the most important events of the month...
cartelera.ingresaFecha: Enter the date it will be published
cartelera.ingresaNombreAutor: Enter the name of the author
cartelera.publicacionImportante: This is your most important post?
cartelera.ingresaInfoNotificacion: Enter the information to create your notification
cartelera.eligeCategoria: Choose the category to which it belongs
cartelera.eligeInmueble: Choose the property to whom you want to send the notification
cartelera.eligeVecino: Choose the neighbor to whom you want to send the notification
cartelera.ingresaTitulo: Enter the title of the news
cartelera.estoEsImportante: This is so important that if they don't find out, the boogeyman takes them
cartelera.name: Enter the name
cartelera.tituloTextoBoton: This option will help you create a button with which you can interact with your neighbors.
cartelera.cuerpoTextoBoton: This button will allow you to send them to fill out forms if you want to hold events that require registration, show them videos that you have on YouTube or on any platform, to show them an example or redirect them to any web page that occurs to you.

vecinos.ingresaEdita: Enter or edit the location information
vecinos.escribeNomenclatura: Write the nomenclature of the useful room
vecinos.tieneOtroCuarto: ¿It has another useful room? Add it
vecinos.describeVehiculo: Describe the vehicle (brand, color and plate)
vecinos.tieneOtroVehiculo: ¿Do you have another vehicle? Add it
vecinos.tieneOtraCelda: ¿Do you have another parking lot? Add him
vecinos.describeMascota: Describe the pet (breed, color and sex)
vecinos.tieneOtraMascota: ¿Do you have another pet? Add it
vecinos.ingresaDatos: Enter the details of your new neighbor
vecinos.ingresaDatosUsuarios: Enter or edit your users' data
vecinos.eligeTipoDocumento: Choose the type of identification document *
vecinos.ingresaDatosVecinos: Enter the data of your neighbors and modify the states
vecinos.momentoBrillar: Here it was, came your time to shine
vecinos.llenarLista: We need to fill out this user list to get the party started. So, without further ado ...
vecinos.noTePreocupes: Do not worry if you do not understand the states, here we will explain what each state means and solve all your doubts.
vecinos.descCreado: We already have the information on this neighbor. You will soon find it in an active state
vecinos.descRetirado: If the neighbor misbehaved or left the urbanization, you can put him as retired. but don't worry, you can activate it again whenever you want
vecinos.enviaMensaje: Send us a message and let's solve it together
